author: ralph.chutikul
title: Energy Finance |Clean energy X DeFi
description: DeFi in all blockchain including Cardano ecosystem grow rapidly but 0 fund or use case go to clean energy
solution: Bring a DeFi protocol that use DeFi fundamental from tokenized renewable energy credit from real world to help driving green financing
experience: A team of 3 with 10+ years in renewable energy, platform business development background and green financing in south east Asia
